sqls.sql: select M."商品管理番号" as productno, M."商品名称" as productname, M."色" as color, M."サイズ" as size, F."ラベル番号" as labelno, M."ASIN番号" as asin, M."SKU番号" as sku, M."並び順" as sortno from "MASTER_出品マスタ情報" M left join "INPUT_FBA在庫情報" F on M."SKU番号" = F."SKU番号" and M."ASIN番号" = F."ASIN番号" and F."販売可否状態" = 'SELLABLE' where M."店舗名" = :shop and M."ラベル番号" is not NULL order by M."商品管理番号", to_number(M."並び順",'999')
